title: 95/189/EC: Commission Decision of 10 May 1995 amending Decision 94/169/EC establishing an initial list of declining industrial areas concerned by Objective 2 as defined by Council Regulation (EEC) No 2052/88
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 10 May 1995 amending Decision 94/169/EC  establishing an initial list of declining industrial areas concerned by Objective 2 as defined by  Council Regulation (EEC) No 2052/88 (95/189/EC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN  COMMUNITIES
main_body: The part annexed to this Decision is added to the Annex to Decision  94/169/EC.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 10 May 1995.
For the Commission Monika WULF-MATHIES Member of the Commission
ANNEX
>TABLE>
